originalText.text: I have used the service with satisfaction for many years, because the basis of the system is reliability. Since 2017, I have had more and more problems due to regular account hacks, which were resolved for a short time, and then started again. In 2023, I couldn't even log in, the system doesn't accept the answers to the security question, there are constant failures. I loved it because of the money-back guarantee, today there is no need to return anything due to its unusability. I'm sorry, but in its current form it's a disaster.

originalText.text: This is the worst money transferring service I have ever used and I never looked back since deletion of my account.  I just want to share my experiences and encourage people not to use them but by the look of their average on here, it seems most people already know that they are scammers.  I disputed a charge that I was scammed two years back, and was reassured by one of their lying workers that I would be refunded as paypal takes good care of their customers blah blah blah.  After an investigation or in other words doing nothing, they concluded they were not going to refund.  This was a lie.  It is two years later and after persistence, I got my refund from the company themselves because I was actually right, isn't it crazy? They lost a customer over a stupid pocket change scam that they could have easily fixed if they followed up on their word.  All they say is sorry as if that helps my situation.  Their de-escalation language is pretty much AI generated (Oh we understand you are upset I would be too).  This does not fix the problem and only makes it worse.  I would also like to add that I provided them with detailed evidence regarding the numbers of the scammers; I did their security job for them and they should have been thanking me.  What is customer service anymore because to work for customer service, it seems I would only need to be trained in how to say sorry in many different ways.  Paypal is horrible, I will never use them again, and I could not encourage everyone enough to DELETE their accounts because LIARS should not be trusted with money access.  Shame on you all. I hope more people expose you for the liars that you are.

originalText.text: As a business owner, I definitely don't recommend PayPal. They will hold your money for any security reason. The most dumb one I got by far, after using PayPal for nearly 4 years, they put my account on hold and asked me to describe my operation. I refused to answer because it's a dumb question and no longer use paypal. THEY DON'T DESERVE MY BUSINESS AND PAYPAL BACK OFFICE CAN GO TO HELL WITH LOSERS SCREWIMG BUSINESSES UP WHILE SITTING BEHIND A DESK.
